interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Fight for Freedom
Review Date: 2015/06/11
Store: Sonic the Hedgehog  (Actor),     Sonic  (Director)    Rated:    NR    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
Product Description: ["Ultra Sonic: Sonic and the Freedom Fighters journey to Robotnik's lab in hopes of deciphering his roboticizer system.  Hooked on Sonics: Sonic conquers Robotnik's latest evil - a vehicle designated to locate and destroy living tissue matter - during a solo mission to the Badlands.  Warp Sonic: When Sonic and the Freedom Fighters take out Robotnik's main computer, they're trapped by Swat-Bots in an underground tunnel, only to be rescued by a handsome teenager named Griff.  Sonic and the Secret Scrolls: Sally, Rotor, Bunnie and Antoine take off in a homemade airplane, bound for an ancient city hidden deep in the Great Mountains, while Sonic follows via his fave transportation - his sneakers. Things go from bad to worse when Robotnik shows up with a Swab-Bot team and demands the scrolls."]
Average Rating: 3.9

Garfield and Friends: Behind the Scenes
Carl Ballantine  (Actor),     Victoria Jackson  (Actor),     Tom Tataranowicz  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Studio Specials, 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment, Fox TV, General
["He's furry! He's fat! He's all that \x96 and more!", "When he's not gobbling lasagna, taking up couch space or toying with his dog pal Odie, Garfield is busy being one hip Hollywood cat in these hilarious adventures hand-picked by creator Jim Davis! From hosting his own special about how cats are from out of this world (literally!) to animating his own cat cartoon to teaching kittens how to annoy their humans, Garfield is fantastically funny in this exclusive DVD! So bring home the humor, the wit and the fun of everyone's favorite fat cat!"]

GREAT MOVIE
Five Stars
Big Hero 6
Ryan Potter  (Actor),     Scott Adsit  (Actor),     Chris Williams  (Director),     Don Hall  (Director)    &                   1                  more   Rated:    PG    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Kids & Family
["With all the heart and humor audiences expect from Walt Disney Animation Studios, BIG HERO 6 is an action-packed comedy adventure that introduces Baymax, a lovable, personal companion robot, who forms a special bond with robotics prodigy Hiro Hamada. When a devastating turn of events catapults them into the midst of a dangerous plot unfolding in the streets of San Fransokyo, Hiro turns to Baymax and his diverse group of friends -- adrenaline junky Go Go Tomago, neatnik Wasabi, chemistry whiz Honey Lemon and fanboy Fred -- who transform into a band of unlikely heroes. Bring home Disney's BIG HERO 6, featuring comic-book-style action and hilarious, unforgettable characters -- it's fun for the whole family!"]

Garfield Show: All You Need Is Love & Pasta
-  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    Unrated    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Romance
["Hearts, flowers and fur balls are in the air with The Garfield Show: All You Need Is Love (and Pasta). You'll have enough fun and laughter to last through nine lives and nine dishes of lasagna as everyone's favorite droll kitty meanders from one hilarious situation to the next. Whether he's fostering orphan birds, enduring John's quest for the perfect family portrait, or putting up a good front for Liz's parents, Garfield really does love his friends... maybe even more than lasagna. Maybe."]

LOVE THIS GUY
Five Stars
Jack
Robin Williams  (Actor),     Diane Lane  (Actor),     Francis Ford Coppola  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Kids & Family
["Comedy favorite Robin Williams (FLUBBER, BICENTENNIAL MAN) lights up the screen in JACK, the acclaimed hit that had critics and audiences cheering! Williams stars as a mischievous 10-year-old who acts like any other boy his age, except he's in a grown-up's body. It's nonstop laughs as Jack embarks on the greatest adventure of his young life ... the fifth grade. In his wildest role ever, Williams takes you on a hilarious ride as Jack explores the ups and downs of life from a kid's point of view! With Bill Cosby (TV's THE COSBY SHOW), and sexy Fran Drescher (TV's THE NANNY), Diane Lane (UNDER THE TUSCAN SUN), and Jennifer Lopez (JERSEY GIRL) -- join the millions of moviegoers who loved this outrageous comedy hit!"]

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **General Interests:** The user maintains a robust enthusiasm for animated comedies and heartwarming family content, particularly those that evoke nostalgia and whimsical journeys. Their recent interaction emphasizes a continued passion for cherished characters and narratives.

- **Media Formats:** Their preference for DVDs persists, as they enjoy the high-quality visuals and immersive sound experiences this format offers.

- **Humor Preference:** The user favors lighthearted narratives that feature relatable characters, promoting joyful and emotional connections, underscoring their desire for uplifting and comedic storytelling.

- **Engagement with Content:** They value behind-the-scenes insights and storytelling depth, which deepen their engagement with characters and comedic elements, enhancing their overall viewing experience.

- **Rating Tendencies:** They consistently provide high ratings, reflecting a profound appreciation for emotionally resonant entertainment. Their latest review demonstrates this trend with a five-star rating, emphasizing enjoyment.

- **Core Values:** The user seeks quality entertainment that balances comedy and adventure, prioritizing feel-good experiences suitable for all ages.

- **Recent Focus:** Their latest interaction showcases an ongoing enthusiasm for comedic tales with endearing characters, reaffirming their commitment to heartwarming adventures and family-friendly humor.

In summary, the user exemplifies a dedication to animated works that blend creativity, laughter, and nostalgia, prioritizing entertainment that fosters family connection through joyous and heartfelt narratives. Their recent engagement reinforces their love for uplifting content.
